00073 // Constants
00074 
00076 static const Quad COAL_POWER_STRENGTH = 700L;
00077 
00079 static const Quad NUCLEAR_POWER_STRENGTH = 2000L;
00080 
00081 
00083 
00084 
00094 bool Micropolis::testForConductive(const Position& pos, Direction2 testDir)
00095 {
00096     Position movedPos(pos);
00097 
00098     if (movedPos.move(testDir)) {
00099         if ((map[movedPos.posX][movedPos.posY] & CONDBIT) == CONDBIT) {
00100             if (!powerGridMap.worldGet(movedPos.posX, movedPos.posY)) {
00101                 return true;
00102             }
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     return false;
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00115 void Micropolis::doPowerScan()
00116 {
00117     Direction2 anyDir,dir;
00118     int conNum;
00119 
00120     // Clear power map.
00121     powerGridMap.clear();
00122 
00123     // Power that the combined coal and nuclear power plants can deliver.
00124     Quad maxPower = coalPowerPop * COAL_POWER_STRENGTH +
00125                     nuclearPowerPop * NUCLEAR_POWER_STRENGTH;
00126 
00127     Quad numPower = 0; // Amount of power used.
00128 
00129     while (powerStackPointer > 0) {
00130         Position pos = pullPowerStack();
00131         anyDir = DIR2_INVALID;
00132         do {
00133             numPower++;
00134             if (numPower > maxPower) {
00135                 sendMessage(MESSAGE_NOT_ENOUGH_POWER);
00136                 return;
00137             }
00138             if (anyDir != DIR2_INVALID) {
00139                 pos.move(anyDir);
00140             }
00141             powerGridMap.worldSet(pos.posX, pos.posY, 1);
00142             conNum = 0;
00143             dir = DIR2_BEGIN;
00144             while (dir < DIR2_END && conNum < 2) {
00145                 if (testForConductive(pos, dir)) {
00146                     conNum++;
00147                     anyDir = dir;
00148                 }
00149                 dir = increment90(dir);
00150             }
00151             if (conNum > 1) {
00152                 pushPowerStack(pos);
00153             }
00154         } while (conNum);
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 
00163 void Micropolis::pushPowerStack(const Position &pos)
00164 {
00165     if (powerStackPointer < (POWER_STACK_SIZE - 2)) {
00166         powerStackPointer++;
00167         powerStackXY[powerStackPointer] = pos;
00168     }
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00177 Position Micropolis::pullPowerStack()
00178 {
00179     assert(powerStackPointer > 0);
00180     powerStackPointer--;
00181     return powerStackXY[powerStackPointer + 1];
00182 }
